results.text: RT @headius: I've spent 6 years of my life helping to build JRuby. This year, the 4th @JRubyConf hosts nearly 200 JRubyists. Big news tomorrow.
RT @kattrali: At a tech conference, surrounded by women! #JRubyConf #RockOn
RT @mrmargolis: Had to pull over due to car troubles on the way to #JRubyConf.   Worst case scenario we found a bar and fireworks.
What an adventure going to #jrubyconf, almost overheated, police escort and it looks like I need to replace my thermostat.
Set the JRubyConf alarm for 5:45. I WILL COMMUTE 4 RUBY!
RT @jruby: JRuby 1.7.0.preview1 is out. First release with invokedynamic support! Just in time for @jrubyconf: http://t.co/LibXw4oZ
@undees fantastic talking with you this evening. It's not often I get to drop my favorite Shakespeare quotes in the wild #jrubyconf
Thanks to @swiftalphaone and @sendgrid for dinner tonight at @JRubyConf.
@jgehtland for the record we are not drinking scotch. Cocktails tonight. @j3 @jrubyconf
RT @jruby: JRuby 1.7.0.preview1 is out. First release with invokedynamic support! Just in time for @jrubyconf: http://t.co/LibXw4oZ
@grosshei you going to JRubyConf? I'm not, but it is close for you.
RT @mrmargolis: @JRubyConf hanging out with @bphogan @johnsonch @jeffersoncarley at Aloft wxyz lounge.  Wearing a Vader shirt.

Minneapolis surprises me around every corner, from the bike share program to the politeness, A+++ will visit again. #JRubyConf
@drawohara @cookrn @dojo4 I'm at JRubyConf in Minnesota for the next few days, flying back Wednesday night :/
RT @copiousfreetime: Wow, unexpected dinner treat from @swiftalphaone, thanks @sendgrid! #jrubyconf
RT @copiousfreetime: Also, huge props to the fine folks of @ThunderboltLabs for dinner and drinks last night. @daksis always treats rubyists well. #jrubyconf
@j3 @JRubyConf a few people are heading out for a walk in a few minutes. You'll sleep better after a walk :-)
@j3 @JRubyConf responsibility is overrated - stand by for next location
Arriving at my hotel for @JRubyConf. Tempted to catch up with people, but trying to be responsible and go to bed.
Also, huge props to the fine folks of @ThunderboltLabs for dinner and drinks last night. @daksis always treats rubyists well. #jrubyconf
Thanks for an awesome dinner @JRubyConf  from @sendgrid by way of @swiftalphaone.
@mrmargolis noooooooooooooooooo! @JRubyConf @bphogan @johnsonch @jeffersoncarley
@SendGrid just got more awesome - big thanks to @swiftalpha1 for dinner! #jrubyconf
Awesome @JRubyConf dinner with fascinating conversation. Thx to @swiftalphaone and @SendGrid!
Wow, unexpected dinner treat from @swiftalphaone, thanks @sendgrid! #jrubyconf
@bphogan @jrubyconf I'm getting more interested in what jruby has to offer
@JRubyConf hanging out with @bphogan @johnsonch @jeffersoncarley at Aloft wxyz lounge.  Wearing a Vader shirt.

At the Aloft, drinking a beer, hacking on code. Ready for @JRubyConf. Say hi.
@doodlehaus Hah, JRuby not Jamaica Ruby.  In any case, crisis averted. We have arrived for #JRubyConf
@headius @JRubyConf another year I I'm missing out. I'll be there next year if I have to start a kickstarter get there.
#jrubyconf starts: amazing food and cocktails for the speakers dinner  - @nicksieger & @MplsFlannery picked a booze filled win
